short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Manage and open multiple URLs in new tabs

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tab Assistant - Batch Tab Manager
A simple and efficient tab management extension that helps you manage and open multiple URLs with ease.

Key Features:
• Batch save frequently used URLs
• Open selected tabs with one click
• Edit and delete URLs
• Support for Chinese and English interface
• Clean and beautiful UI design

Perfect for users who frequently need to open specific URL combinations, such as developers, students, or daily work use.

Tab助手 - 批量标签页管理工具

一个简单高效的标签页管理插件，帮助你轻松管理和打开多个网址。

主要功能：
• 批量保存常用网址
• 一键打开选中的标签页
• 支持编辑和删除网址
• 支持中英文界面切换
• 简洁美观的界面设计

非常适合需要经常打开固定网址组合的用户，如开发人员、学习者或日常工作使用。
